value:
This winter festival, I know my date
with destiny is waiting in the wings!
Now I just have to find them!

My voice is a gift from the goddess.
Will it resound even more strongly
during these festivities, I wonder?

Of course I prefer receiving gifts to
giving them...but it always makes me
happy to see my students smile.

Hmm? Do I have any plans for after
the festival quiets down tonight?
How should I take that question, hm?

How do you like my festival outfit?
I imagine several someones would be
happy to get this as a present, eh?

I'm Manuela. I thought you'd like to
know the winter festival's under way
at $Nf's castle!

I think a special performance is in
order to properly commemorate the
winter festival. A song, then!

The winter festival is a chance for me
to shine brighter than ever before!

Ugh... This blasted hangover has
some teeth... Oof...

Is this for me? Oh my. Is it possible?
Could you be...the one?!

I'm Manuela. By day I'm a professor
at Garreg Mach, but tonight I'm here
to revel in the holiday spirit with you!

Hear that laughter from the houses?
The lucky ones are inside, enjoying
each other's company.$k$pOn this sacred night, I'll lift my voice
in celebration and prayer, that all may
be blessed with a bright tomorrow.$k$pBut what'll happen when the festival
envoy needs help? I'm close to
becoming a festival spinster!$k$pSay, why am I out here freezing my
rear off when I could be finding
someone to keep me warm?!$k$pHmph. Well, I'm off to the pub. Come
along, Summoner. You can just drink
tea if you want.$k$pNext year, I'm going to be cozying
up to that fireplace next to someone
special. I can see it now...
やあっ
A gift!
きゃあっ
きゃああああっ
Are you enjoying the festival?
How irritating.
This won't feel good.
I've still got it!
Rejected...again...
*Giggling*
I'm used to dressing up for the stage, but this is a bit much...
Oh, it's you. I was just thinking how nice it would be to have some company.
The students seem to be having fun. That's a relief.
I hope someone charming will come along and give me a gift too.
Something about the cold weather makes me feel even more single than usual...
There are happy couples everywhere... *sigh*
Shall we sing a special song for the winter festival?
Happy to help.
I suppose so...
I'm on my way.
